Room.Name: Rosecrest Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Rosecrest Street, just south of the Cetacean Bridge.
Room.LongDescription: The Cetacean Bridge, located to the north along Rosecrest Street, connects the north and south portions of town together. The Lithium Inlet and the Nylandian Bay create a natural barrier between the two sections of town. As you look to the north, you can usually see a number of playful dolphins swimming in the warm Lithium Inlet.
